testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the pay grades
testcase.name: Verify the add pay grade and add currency functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in Pay Grades page........................................undefined When the user clicks on Add button in Pay Grades page.......................skipped Then the user is in Add Pay Grade Page......................................skipped When user adds the parameters "Grade_Bala"..................................skipped And the user clicks on Save button in Add Pay Grades Page...................skipped Then the Edit Pay Grade page and Currencies should be visible...............skipped When the user clicks on Add button near Currencies..........................skipped Then the Add Currency page should be visible................................skipped When user adds the parameters "INR - Indian Rupee", "10000", "25000"........skipped And the user clicks on Save button in Add Currency Page.....................skipped Then the newly added "INR - Indian Rupee" is visible........................skipped When the user clicks button cancel in Edit Pay Grade page...................skipped Then the newly added pay grade "Grade_Bala" is visible......................skipped

testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the pay grades
